BackstoryDef.title: quickdraw
BackstoryDef.description: Words of the law were never absolute to [PAWN_nameDef]. [PAWN_pronoun] earned a reputation for shooting first and asking questions later—a dependable kind of loose cannon. And to be fair, none of [PAWN_possessive] employers ever hired [PAWN_objective] to ask questions first.

BackstoryDef.title: captain
BackstoryDef.description: Although [PAWN_nameDef] had no military background whatsoever, people ended up calling [PAWN_objective] captain—mostly because [PAWN_pronoun] flew around in a old freighter long enough for the name to stick. With [PAWN_possessive] roguish charm and smooth words, [PAWN_pronoun] made a tidy living bashing in the skulls of [PAWN_possessive] targets and locking down whatever contracts came [PAWN_possessive] way.

BackstoryDef.title: ace pilot
BackstoryDef.description: Deck of cards or a starfighter, [PAWN_nameDef] could handle either like an ace. [PAWN_pronoun] picked up the nickname at some backwater bar after winning three hands in a row with four-of-a-kind aces—apparently without cheating.

BackstoryDef.title: Reichswehr soldier
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] joined the Reichswehr as a career. Service was not a calling, but a certainty—serve the Kaiserin, prove loyalty to the Reich, and advance through the ranks by due process. Orders are followed, duties are fulfilled, as simple as that.

BackstoryDef.title: Reichswehr soldier
BackstoryDef.description: Among the many benefits service promised, [PAWN_nameDef] joined the Reichswehr for free healthcare, meals, and lodging. Not the noblest reason in hindsight—but not a bad one either. In the end, [PAWN_pronoun] liked fighting aliens while getting paid for it.

BackstoryDef.title: Reichswehr soldier
BackstoryDef.description: When [PAWN_nameDef] was still a kitten, [PAWN_possessive] always looked up to soldiers—they carried themselves with an effortless confidence. After joining the Reichswehr, [PAWN_nameDef] quickly learned the art of “keep calm and bullshit through,” discovering that confidence could be practiced as much as it was worn.

BackstoryDef.title: Reichswehr line trooper
BackstoryDef.description: When [PAWN_nameDef] joined the Reichswehr, [PAWN_pronoun] had high hopes of fighting the enemies of the Kaiserin, shoulder to shoulder with capable, confident comrades. To be fair, that part turned out to be true. What no one mentioned was the endless trench digging and encampment work—most of it done with a shovel.

BackstoryDef.title: Reichswehr line trooper
BackstoryDef.description: In hindsight, [PAWN_nameDef] should have thought twice before applying for infantry. [PAWN_pronoun] had severely underestimated the sworn enemy of all infantry—marches. Now everything ached, and [PAWN_nameDef] had only [PAWN_objective]self to blame while bandaging blistered feet.
